titles: To all ministers of Gods vvord church-wardens, maiors, sheriffes, bayliffes, constables, tything-men, and other officers whatsoever, to whom these may concerne, greeting.
notes: Signed at end: Savill Ratcliffe, [and 4 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
